Extension_Description.message: You can use the CSS Selector to specify elements with links on the displayed web page and download them all at once.

CSS_SELECTOR_DOWNLOADER_ONLY_WEBSITE_MES.message: This extension is only available on the website.

CSS_SELECTOR_DOWNLOADER_DESCRIPTION_CSS_.message: Enter the condition to enumerate elements with downloaded links.

CSS_SELECTOR_DOWNLOADER_FORM_ERROR_INVAL.message: The query entered is not valid.

CSS_SELECTOR_DOWNLOADER_DESCRIPTION_FILE.message: The download file is saved with the entered file name + sequential number.

CSS_SELECTOR_DOWNLOADER_DESCRIPTION_DOWN.message: Downloaded the linked files for elements that meet the criteria specified in the CSS Selector.
